ee sanwidhanaya athule salli athi nathi bedayak natha, mudal katayak thaba atha eeta kamathi aadharayak diya hakiyi.mowun kisima rataka jathika kodiyakata hisa nawima prathikshepa karayi, manda owun adahanne dewa rajyaya nisa, naththala samaranneda natha ( naththala aththatama kalin wena uthsawayakata aadesha wuwak bawa kawurut piliganna karunakne )me nithi walata anugatha nowana aya samajikathwayen iwath karanu labayi, mayikal jaksange kuddakalaye yohowa sakshikaruwku wu athara ohu ge githa sadacharathmaka nowana bawin sangamayen iwath kaleyamowun mudal di aagamata harawana, yaghnawen leda suwakarana saha balen aagamata harawannan nowana bawa nam kiwa hakiyi, eeth mowungen kenek budu pilimayak athara sita pinthurayak gaththath eya waradak se dakithi.
